subject: You’re in — let’s get your call flow live today
message:
Hey {{first_name}},

Welcome to Saw.City. You can go from signup to live call handling in a few steps:
1) Confirm your number setup
2) Set your greeting
3) Configure routing
4) Run a quick test call

No demo call needed—just finish setup and go live.

Complete setup: {{onboarding_link}}

subject: Ready to stop the missed-call leak?
message:
